description.full: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 1-4, Local Multiplayer 1-4, HD (High Definition). Step into the winnerâ€™s circle with six classic events to test your skills.  Race in the 100mDash and 110mHurdles, test your skills with the Javelin and Hammer Throw, and hop to it with the Long Jump and High Jump.  Compete with up to four players on Xbox LIVE and  global rankings will compare your skills and announce the World Champion. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/Live/accounts.
description.short: On your mark!  Get set!  Go!  Test your skills in the original virtual athletic competition upgraded with new graphics and sounds.  This trial includes two of the six sports to give you a taste of glory.  Full version includes all sports and multiplayer for four players on one Xbox or over Xbox LIVE.
